extended:
The Sum of Its Parts - 

Teen Wolf, Stiles and Derek are in an asexual but romantic relationship.  It's not the focus of the series, but it is a big part of it.  Additionally, there's a lot of pack bonding and cuddling and spending time with each other.

You could probably skip the first story if this is what you're reading for, or at least the first half of the first story.

extended:
A Desperate Arrangement by mikkimouse



It has it all: arranged marriage, pining, insecurity, magic, characterization I like, sex that I'm into, no ridiculous biology needed to make an m/m marriage plausible, excellent use of multiple POVs, and a tightly written larger plot on top of that. I will read this story even years after I inevitably have a bitter fallout with the fandom.
